comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Opera singer and under surveillance as an American spy in Italy in 1913 Miss Dorothea A. Macvane, daughter of Prof. Silas M. Macvane of Boston, formerly McLean Professor of Ancient and Modern History at Harvard University. ... Istarted an entry in Wikipedia for her: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dorothea_A._MacVane
